anya-e0905n4:2: Pucchā – bhaṇḍanādikārakassa āvuso bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:3_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante paṇḍukalohitake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, paṇḍukalohitakā
anya-e0905n4:3_1: bhante bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe
anya-e0905n4:3_2: adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā
anya-e0905n4:3_3: saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṁsu “mā kho tumhe āyasmanto eso ajesi,
anya-e0905n4:3_4: balavābalavaṁ paṭimantetha, tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā
anya-e0905n4:3_5: ca alamattatarā ca, mā cassa bhāyittha, mayampi tumhākaṁ pakkhā bhavissāmā”ti, tena
anya-e0905n4:3_6: anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0905n4:4: Pucchā – tajjanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:5_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa tajjanīyakammakatassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0905n4:5_1: taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā sāvatthiyaṁ anuññātaṁ, teyeva paṇḍukalohitakā
anya-e0905n4:5_2: bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattitvā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā yāciṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:6_0: Pucchā – bālassa āvuso abyattassa āpattibahulassa anapadānassa gihisaṁsaṭṭhassa ananulomikehi
anya-e0905n4:6_1: gihisaṁsaggehi niyassakammaṁ kātuṁ kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:7_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n4:7_1: seyyasako bālo ahosi abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno gihisaṁsaṭṭho vihāsi ananulomikehi
anya-e0905n4:8: Pucchā – niyassakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:9_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa niyassa kammakatassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0905n4:9_1: taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ, na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo
anya-e0905n4:9_2: dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo, na bhikkhunovādakasammuti sāditabbā, sammatenapi
anya-e0905n4:9_3: bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbā, evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattantassa
anya-e0905n4:9_4: niyassakammakatassa bhikkhuno taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:10: Pucchā – kuladūsakassa āvuso pāpasamācārassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:11_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, assajipunabbasukā
anya-e0905n4:11_1: bhante bhikkhū kīṭāgirismiṁ kuladūsakā ahesuṁ pāpasamācārā, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:12_0: Pucchā – paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ āvuso pucchāmi, saddhaṁ āvuso pasannaṁ gahapatiṁ dāyakaṁ
anya-e0905n4:12_1: kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁsentassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0905n4:12_2: kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:13_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ, bhagavati
anya-e0905n4:13_1: bhante sāvatthiyaṁ viharati āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ
anya-e0905n4:13_2: pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁsesi hīnena vambhesi, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:14: Tenahi bhikkhave saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ karotu “citto te gahapati khamāpetabbo”ti –
anya-e0905n4:15_0: Pucchā – paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno anudūtaṁ dātuñca tena anudūtena
anya-e0905n4:15_1: saddhiṁ gantvā yathākhuṁsitaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ ca bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:16_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁyeva sudhammaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ, āyasmā
anya-e0905n4:16_1: bhante sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ,
anya-e0905n4:17: Pucchā – paṭisāraṇīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno katisu vattesu sammā vattantassa taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:18: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasasu bhante vattesu sammā vattantassa paṭisāraṇīya kammakatassa bhikkhuno taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:19_0: Pucchā – āpattiṁ āvuso āpajjitvā taṁ āpattiṁ passituṁ vā paṭikātuṁ vā na icchantassa
anya-e0905n4:19_1: bhikkhuno āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0905n4:19_2: paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:20_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channattheraṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, āyasmā
anya-e0905n4:20_1: bhante channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchi taṁ āpattiṁ passituṁ vā paṭikātuṁ vā, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:21: Pucchā – āpattiyā āvuso adassanena vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīya kammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:22: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:23: Pucchā – ukkhepanīyakammakatassa āvuso bhikkhuno sammā vattantassa taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambhetuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:24_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁyeva channaṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0905n4:24_1: channo saṅghena āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattesi
anya-e0905n4:24_2: lomaṁpātesi netthāraṁ vattesi saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiyā
anya-e0905n4:25_0: Pucchā – pāpikaṁ āvuso diṭṭhiṁ gahetvā taṁ diṭṭhiṁ na paṭinissajjantassa pāpikāya
anya-e0905n4:25_1: diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha
anya-e0905n4:26_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:26_1: bhagavati bhante sāvatthiyaṁ viharati ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa
anya-e0905n4:26_2: evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ ahosi “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi,
anya-e0905n4:26_3: yathāyeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:27: Pucchā – pāpikāya āvuso diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:28: Vissajjanā – tecattālīsāya bhante vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:29: Pucchā – kammakkhandhakaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidāni saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:30: Vissajjanā – kammakkhandhakaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:32: Pucchā – pārivāsikassa āvuso pakatattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhivādanādīni sādiyantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:33_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante pārivāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, pārivāsikā
anya-e0905n4:33_1: bhante bhikkhū sādiyiṁsu pakatattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhivādanādīni, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:34: Pucchā – pārivāsikena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:35: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikena bhante bhikkhunā catunavutiyā vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:36: Pucchā – pārivāsikaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:37: Vissajjanā – pārivāsikaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:39: Pucchā – samuccayaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:40: Vissajjanā – samuccayaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:42_0: Pucchā – asammukhībhūtānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ
anya-e0905n4:42_1: vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā kammaṁ karontassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:43_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:43_1: bhante bhikkhū asammukhībhūtānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kammaṁ akaṁsu tajjanīyampi niyassampi
anya-e0905n4:43_2: pabbājanīyampi paṭisāraṇīyampi ukkhepanīyampi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:44: Pucchā – sativepullapattassa āvuso bhikkhuno sativinayaṁ dānaṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:45_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ mettiyabhūmajakā
anya-e0905n4:45_1: bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsesuṁ,
anya-e0905n4:47_0: Vissajjanā – pañcimāni bhante dhammikāni sativinayassa dānāni, suddho hoti bhikkhu
anya-e0905n4:47_1: anāpattiko, anuvadanti ca naṁ, yācati ca, tassa saṅgho sativinayaṁ deti dhammena
anya-e0905n4:47_2: samaggena, imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni sati vinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n4:48: Pucchā – amūḷhassa āvuso bhikkhuno amūḷhavinayaṁ dātuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:49_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:49_1: bhikkhū gaggaṁ bhikkhuṁ ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codesuṁ
anya-e0905n4:49_2: “saratā yasmā evarūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā”ti, so evaṁ vadeti “ahaṁ kho āvuso ummattako
anya-e0905n4:49_3: ahosi cittavipariyāsakato, tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ
anya-e0905n4:49_4: ajjhāciṇṇaṁ bhāsitaparikkantaṁ, nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmi, mūḷhena me etaṁ kata”nti. Evampi
anya-e0905n4:49_5: naṁ vuccamānā codenteva “saratā yasmā evarūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā”ti, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0905n4:50: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n4:51_0: Vissajjanā – tīṇi bhante adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, idha bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0905n4:51_1: āpattiṁ āpanno hoti, tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā “saratāyasmā
anya-e0905n4:51_2: evarūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā”ti, so saramānova evaṁ vadeti “na kho ahaṁ āvuso sarāmi
anya-e0905n4:51_3: evarūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā”ti. Añño saramānova evaṁ vadeti “sarāmi kho ahaṁ āvuso
anya-e0905n4:51_4: yathā supinantenā”ti. Añño anummattakova ummattakālayaṁ karoti “ahampi kho evaṁ karomi,
anya-e0905n4:51_5: tumhepi evaṁ karotha, mayhampi etaṁ kappati, tumhākampetaṁ kappatī”ti. Esaṁ saṅgho
anya-e0905n4:51_6: amūḷhavinayaṁ deti, adhammikaṁ bhante amūḷhavinayassa dānaṁ. Imāni kho bhante tīṇi
anya-e0905n4:52: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, vibhajitvā kathehi.
anya-e0905n4:53_0: Vissajjanā – tīṇi bhante dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, idha bhante bhikkhu ummattako
anya-e0905n4:53_1: hoti cittavipariyāsakato tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ
anya-e0905n4:53_2: ajjhāciṇṇaṁ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṁ, tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo
anya-e0905n4:53_3: vā “saratāyasmā evarūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā”ti, so assaramānova evaṁ vadeti “na kho
anya-e0905n4:53_4: ahaṁ āvuso sarāmi evarūpiṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā”ti. Aññopi assaramānova evaṁ vadeti “sarāmi
anya-e0905n4:53_5: kho ahaṁ āvuso yathā supinantenā”ti. Aññopi ummattakova ummattakālayaṁ karoti “ahampi
anya-e0905n4:53_6: evaṁ karomi, tumhepi evaṁ karotha, mayhampi etaṁ kappati, tumhākampetaṁ kappatī”ti.
anya-e0905n4:53_7: Esaṁ bhante tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ saṅgho amūḷhavinayaṁ deti, dhammikaṁ bhante amūḷhavinayassa
anya-e0905n4:53_8: dānaṁ. Imāni kho bhante tīṇi dhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni.
anya-e0905n4:54: Pucchā – appaṭiññāya āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyādīni kammāni karontassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:55_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n4:55_1: bhikkhū appaṭiññāya bhikkhūnaṁ kammāni akaṁsu tajjanīyādīni, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:56: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso adhammikaṁ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:57: Vissajjanā – aññathā bhante āpattiṁ āpajjantassa aññathā paṭijānantassa yathā so paṭijānāti, tathā saṅgho kāreti, evaṁ kho bhante adhammikaṁ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:58: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso dhammikaṁ hoti paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:59: Vissajjanā – yaṁ bhante āpattiṁ āpajjantassa tameva paṭijānantassa teneva saṅgho kāreti, evaṁ kho bhante dhammikaṁ paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:60: Pucchā – yebhuyyasikāya āvuso adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:61_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:61_1: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā vihariṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:61_2: na sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:62: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇaṁ yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:63_0: Vissajjanā – pañcahi bhante aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu salākaggāhāpako sammannitabbo,
anya-e0905n4:63_1: tena bhante salākaggāhāpakena salākā gāhātabbā yathā bahutarā bhikkhū dhammavādino
anya-e0905n4:63_2: vadanti tathā taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametabbaṁ, evaṁ kho bhante yebhuyyasikāya adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:65_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante adhammikā salākaggāhā, oramattakañca adhikaraṇaṁ hoti, na
anya-e0905n4:65_1: ca gatigataṁ hoti, na ca saritasāritaṁ hoti, jānāti ‘adhammavādī bahutarā’ti, appeva
anya-e0905n4:65_2: nāma adhammavādī bahutarā assūti, jānāti ‘saṅgho bhijjissatī’ti, appeva nāma saṅgho
anya-e0905n4:65_3: bhijjeyyāti, adhammena gaṇhanti, vaggā gaṇhanti, na ca yathādiṭṭhiyā gaṇhanti, ime
anya-e0905n4:67: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante dhammikā salākaggāhā vuttavipariyāyena.
anya-e0905n4:68: Pucchā – pāpussannassa āvuso bhikkhussa tassa pāpiyasikā kammaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:69_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante upavāḷaṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, upavāḷo bhante
anya-e0905n4:69_1: bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānāti,
anya-e0905n4:69_2: aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati, sampajānamusā bhāsati, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:70: Pucchā – kati āvuso dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n4:71_0: Vissajjanā – pañcimāni bhante dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni. Asuci
anya-e0905n4:71_1: ca hoti, alajjī ca, sānuvādo ca, tassa saṅgho tassapāpiyasikā kammaṁ karoti dhammena
anya-e0905n4:71_2: samaggena, imāni kho bhante pañca dhammikāni tassa pāpiyasikā kammassa karaṇāni.
anya-e0905n4:72: Pucchā – tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena āvuso bhikkhunā katisu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:73_0: Vissajjanā – tassa pāpiyasikākammakatena bhante bhikkhunā aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā
anya-e0905n4:73_1: vattitabbaṁ. Na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo,
anya-e0905n4:73_2: evamādīsu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vattesu sammā vattitabbaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:74: Pucchā – kati āvuso adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni.
anya-e0905n4:75_0: Vissajjanā – cattārimāni bhante adhikaraṇāni samathehi vūpasametabbāni, vivādādhikaraṇaṁ
anya-e0905n4:75_1: anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, imāni bhante cattāri adhikaraṇāni
anya-e0905n4:77_0: Vissajjanā – cha bhante vivādamūlāni vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, tīṇipi akusalamūlāni
anya-e0905n4:77_1: vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, tīṇipi kusalamūlāni vivādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, idaṁ bhante
anya-e0905n4:79_0: Vissajjanā – cha bhante anuvādamūlāni anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, tīṇipi akusalamūlāni
anya-e0905n4:79_1: anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, tīṇipi kusalamūlāni anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, kāyopi
anya-e0905n4:79_2: anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, vācāpi anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, idaṁ kho bhante anuvādādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:81_0: Vissajjanā – cha bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānā āpattādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ, atti bhante āpatti
anya-e0905n4:81_1: kāyato samuṭṭhāti na vācato na cittato, atthi bhante āpatti vācato samuṭṭhāti na
anya-e0905n4:81_2: kāyato na cittato, atthi bhante āpatti kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti na cittato,
anya-e0905n4:81_3: atthi bhante āpatti kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti na vācato, atthi bhante āpatti
anya-e0905n4:81_4: vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti na kāyato, atthi bhante āpatti kāyato ca vācato ca
anya-e0905n4:81_5: cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, imāni bhante cha āpatti samuṭṭhānāni āpattādhikaraṇassa mūlaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:83: Vissajjanā – kiccādhikaraṇassa bhante ekaṁ mūlaṁ saṅgho.
anya-e0905n4:84: Pucchā – samathaṁ āvuso pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:85: Vissajjanā – samathaṁ bhante vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:87: Pucchā – nahāyantena āvuso bhikkhunā rukkhe vā thambhe vā kuṭṭe vā kāyaṁ ugghaṁsentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:88_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante
anya-e0905n4:88_1: bhikkhū nahāyamānā rukkhepi thambhepi kuṭṭepi kāyaṁ ugghaṁsesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:89: Pucchā – gandhabbahatthakena vā āvuso kuruvindakasuttiyā vā mallakena vā nahāyantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:90_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhbhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:90_1: bhante bhikkhū gandhabbahatthakenapi kuruvindakasuttiyāpi mallakenapi nahāyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:91: Pucchā – pāṇinā āvuso parikammaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:92: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū piṭṭhiparikammaṁ kātuṁ kukkuccāyiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:93_0: Pucchā – vallikaṁ vā āvuso pāmaṅgaṁ vā kaṇṭhasuttakaṁ vā kaṭisuttakaṁ vā ovaṭṭikaṁ
anya-e0905n4:93_1: vā kāyuraṁ vā hatthābharaṇaṁ vā aṅgulimuddikaṁ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0905n4:93_2: kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:94: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vallikādīni dhāresuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:95: Pucchā – dīghe āvuso kese dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:96: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dīghe kese dhāresuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:97: Pucchā – kocchenavā āvuso phaṇakenavā hatthaphaṇakenavā kese osaṇṭhentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:98: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kocchādīhi kese osaṇṭhesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:99: Pucchā – ādāse vā āvuso udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṁ olokentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:100: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ādāsepi udakapattepi mukhanimittaṁ olokesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:101: Pucchā – ābādhapaccayā panāvuso ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṁ oloketuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:102_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ, bhagavati bhante
anya-e0905n4:102_1: rājagahe viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno mukhe vaṇo ahosi, so bhikkhū etadavoca “kīdiso
anya-e0905n4:102_2: me āvuso vaṇo”ti, bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu “ediso te āvuso vaṇo”ti, so na saddahati, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:103: Pucchā – mukhālepanādīni āvuso karontassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:104: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mukhālepanādīni akaṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:105: Pucchā – naccaṁ vā āvuso gītaṁ vā vāditaṁ vā dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:106: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya gacchiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:107: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso naccādīni passantassa āpatti hoti, kathaṁ pana anāpatti.
anya-e0905n4:108_0: Vissajjanā – naccaṁ vā bhante gītaṁ vā vāditaṁ vā dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n4:108_1: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa, dassanūpacāraṁ vijahitvā punappunaṁ
anya-e0905n4:108_2: passati āpatti dukkaṭassa, ārāme ṭhitassa passato anāpatti, vihārato pana vihāraṁ
anya-e0905n4:108_3: passissāmīti gacchato āpattiyeva, yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n4:108_4: āsanasālāya nisinno passati anāpatti, passissāmīti vuṭṭhahitvā gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
anya-e0905n4:108_5: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa, patipathaṁ gacchanto passati
anya-e0905n4:108_6: anāpatti, gīvaṁ parivattetvā passato pana āpatti bhante.
anya-e0905n4:109: Pucchā – āyatakena āvuso gītassarena dhammaṁ gāyantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:110: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṁ gāyiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:111: Pucchā – dārupattaṁ āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:112_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, āyasmā
anya-e0905n4:112_1: bhante piṇḍolabhāradvājo chavassa dārupattassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ
anya-e0905n4:112_2: iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ dasseti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:113: Na ca bhikkhave dārupatto dhāretabbo, yo dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa –
anya-e0905n4:114: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso uccāvace patte paṭikkhipitvā ayo patto bhūmipattoti imeyeva dve pattā kattha anuññātā, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:115: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uccāvace patte dhāresuṁ sovaṇṇamayā rūpiyamayā, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:116: Pucchā – sodakaṁ āvuso pattaṁ paṭisāmentassa ca otāpentassaca uṇhe pattaṁ nidahantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:117_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:117_1: bhikkhū sodakaṁ pattaṁ paṭisāmesuṁ, otāpesuṁ, uṇhe pattaṁ nidahiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0905n4:118: Pucchā – chavasīsapattaṁ āvuso dhārentassa ca sabbapaṁsukūlikassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:119_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, aññataro bhante
anya-e0905n4:119_1: bhikkhu sabbapaṁsukūliko ahosi, so chavasīsassa pattaṁ dhāresi, aññatarā itthī passitvā
anya-e0905n4:119_2: bhītā vissaramakāsi “abhuṁ me pisāco vatāya”nti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:120: Pucchā – calakāni vā āvuso aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṁ vā pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:121_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:121_1: bhikkhū calakānipi aṭṭhikānipi ucchiṭṭho dakampi pattena nīhariṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0905n4:122: Pucchā – upāhanatthavikā āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:123_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṁ antarā ca vesāliṁ aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha
anya-e0905n4:123_1: anuññātā, aññataro bhante bhikkhu upāhanāyo kāyabandhanena bandhitvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya
anya-e0905n4:123_2: pāvisi, aññataro upāsako taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādento upāhanāyo sīsena ghaṭṭeti, so bhikkhu
anya-e0905n4:123_3: maṅku ahosi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:124_0: Pucchā – addhānamaggappaṭipannena āvuso parissāvanaṁ yāciyamānena na dadantassa ca
anya-e0905n4:124_1: appaṭissāvanakena addhānaṁ paṭipajjantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:125_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṁ antarā ca vesāliṁ aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha
anya-e0905n4:125_1: paññattaṁ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu parissāvanaṁ yāciyamāno na adāsi, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0905n4:126: Pucchā – pupphābhikiṇṇe āvuso sayane sayantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:127: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pupphābhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n4:128_1: vā tuvaṭṭānaṁ dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:129_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:129_1: bhante bhikkhū ekabhājanepi bhuñjiṁsu, ekathālakepi piviṁsu, ekamañcakepi tuvaṭṭesuṁ,
anya-e0905n4:129_2: ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭesuṁ, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭesuṁ, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:130: Pucchā – cāmaribījaniṁ āvuso paṭikkhipitvā tisso bījaniyo bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kismiñca vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:131_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante anuññātā, sāvatthiyaṁ bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghassa
anya-e0905n4:131_1: cāmaribījanī uppannā ahosi, bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:132: Na bhikkhave cāmaribījanī dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi bhikkhave tisso bījaniyo vākamayaṁ usīramayaṁ morapiñchā mayaṁ.

anya-e0905n4:134: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu dīghe nakhe dhāresi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n4:136: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kattarikāya kese chindiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n4:142_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:142_1: bhante bhikkhū saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdiṁsu, saṅghāṭiyā pattā lujjiṁsu, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:143: Pucchā – akāyabandhanena āvuso gāmaṁ pavisantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:144: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu akāyabandhano gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:145: Pucchā – gihinivatthaṁ āvuso nivāsentassa ca, gihipārutaṁ pārupantassa ca, saṁvelliyaṁ nivāsentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:146_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:146_1: bhante bhikkhū gihinivatthaṁ nivāsiṁsu, gihipārutampi pārupiṁsu, saṁvelliyampi nivāsiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:147: Pucchā – ubhato kājaṁ āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:148: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ubhato kājaṁ dhāresuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:149: Pucchā – lokāyataṁ āvuso pariyāpuṇantassa ca vācentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:150: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū lokāyataṁ pariyāpuṇiṁsupi vācesumpi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:151: Pucchā – tiracchānavijjaṁ āvuso pariyāpuṇantassa ca vācentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:152: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū tiracchānavijjaṁ pariyāpuṇiṁsupi vācesumpi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:153: Pucchā – khipite āvuso “jīvā”tivadantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:154_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, bhagavā bhante
anya-e0905n4:154_1: mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṁ desento khipi, bhikkhū “jīvatu bhante bhagavā,
anya-e0905n4:154_2: jīvatu sugatoti” uccāsaddaṁ mahāsaddaṁ akaṁsu, tena saddena dhammakathā antarā ahosi,
anya-e0905n4:155: Pucchā – ārāme āvuso passāvavaccānaṁ tahaṁ tahaṁ karaṇaṁ paṭikkhipitvā ekamantaṁ kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:156_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:156_1: bhikkhū ārāme tahaṁ tahaṁ passāvaṁ akaṁsu, tahaṁ tahaṁ vaccaṁ akaṁsu, ārāmo dussi,
anya-e0905n4:158: Pucchā – khuddakavatthuṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:159: Vissajjanā – khuddakaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:161: Pucchā – pañca āvuso leṇāni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n4:162_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:162_1: bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ “rājagahako bhante seṭṭhī vihāre kārāpetukāmo,
anya-e0905n4:162_2: kathaṁ nu kho bhante paṭipajjitabba”nti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n4:163: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso vihārā paṭhamaṁ uppannā, kathañca te patiṭṭhāpi tā.
anya-e0905n4:164: Vissajjanā – ekāheneva bhante rājagahakena seṭṭhinā chaṭṭhivihārā patiṭṭhāpitā, te idha bhante saṭṭhivihārā buddhappamukhassa āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa patiṭṭhāpitā.
anya-e0905n4:165: Pucchā – vihāre āvuso paṭibhānakammaṁ paṭikkhipitvā mālākammādīni bhagavatā kattha anuññātāni, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātāni.
anya-e0905n4:166_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātāni. Chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:166_1: bhante bhikkhū vihāre paṭibhānacittaṁ kārāpesuṁ itthirūpakaṁ purisarūpakaṁ, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:167_0: Pucchā – yathāvuḍḍhaṁ āvuso abhivādanādīni ca aggāsanādīni ca anujānitvā saṅghikaṁ
anya-e0905n4:167_1: yathāvuḍḍhaṁ paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ
anya-e0905n4:168_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante vesāliṁ antarā ca sāvatthiṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0905n4:168_1: antevāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyānaṁ bhante bhikkhūnaṁ antevāsikā
anya-e0905n4:168_2: bhikkhū buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa purato purato gantvā vihāre paṭiggahesuṁ, seyyāyo
anya-e0905n4:168_3: paṭiggahesuṁ “idaṁ amhākaṁ upajjhāyānaṁ bhavissati, idaṁ amhākaṁ ācariyānaṁ bhavissati,
anya-e0905n4:168_4: idaṁ amhākaṁ bhavissatī”ti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:169: Pucchā – ekena āvuso dve paṭibāhantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:170: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto eko dve paṭibāhi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:171_0: Pucchā – navakena āvuso uddisantena samake vā āsane nisīdituṁ uccatare vā dhammagāravena,
anya-e0905n4:171_1: therena pana bhikkhunā uddisāpentena samake vā āsane nisīdituṁ nīcatare vā dhammagāravena
anya-e0905n4:171_2: bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:172_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:172_1: bhikkhū āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇiṁsu, āyasmā bhante upāli ṭhitakova
anya-e0905n4:172_2: uddisati therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ gāravena, tattha bhante therā ceva bhikkhū kilamiṁsu
anya-e0905n4:172_3: āyasmā ca upāli kilami, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:173: Pucchā – tivassantarena āvuso saha nisīdituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:174_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulānaṁ
anya-e0905n4:174_1: bhante bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi “kittāvatānu kho samānāsaniko hotī”ti, tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0905n4:175: Pucchā – mañce ca āvuso pīṭhe ca dvinnaṁyeva nisīdituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:176_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule samānāsanike ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n4:176_1: bhante bhikkhū samānāsanikā mañce nisīditvā mañcaṁ bhindiṁsu, pīṭhe nisīditvā pīṭhaṁ
anya-e0905n4:177: Pucchā – dīghāsane panāvuso asamānāsanikehipi nisīdituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:178_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:178_1: bhikkhū dīghāsane asamānāsanikehi saha nisīdituṁ kukkuccāyiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:179: Pucchā – pañca āvuso avissajjiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n4:180: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṁ senāsanaṁ vissajjesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:181: Pucchā – pañca āvuso avebhaṅgiyāni bhagavatā kattha paññattāni, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n4:182: Vissajjanā – kīṭāgirismiṁ bhante assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattāni, assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṁ senāsanaṁ vibhajiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattāni.
anya-e0905n4:183: Pucchā – aññatra paribhogaṁ āvuso aññatra paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:184_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:184_1: bhikkhū aññatarassa upāsakassa vihāraparibhogaṁ senāsanaṁ aññatra paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:185_0: Pucchā – adhotehi ca āvuso allehi ca pādehi senāsanaṁ akkamantassa ca saupāhanena
anya-e0905n4:185_1: senāsanaṁ akkamantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ
anya-e0905n4:186_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:186_1: bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi senāsanaṁ akkamiṁsu, allehi ca pādehi senāsanaṁ akkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:186_2: saupāhanāpi senāsanaṁ akkamiṁsu, senāsanaṁ dussi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:187: Pucchā – parikammakatāya āvuso bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhantassa ca parikammakataṁ bhittiṁ apassayantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:188_0: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṁ bhante sambahuleva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:188_1: bhikkhū parikammakatāya bhūmiyā niṭṭhubhiṁsu, parikammakataṁ bhittiṁ apassayiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:189: Pucchā – senāsanakkhandhakaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:190: Vissajjanā – senāsanakkhandhakaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:192: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso channaṁ sakyakumārānaṁ saha upālikappakena pabbajjā ahosi, kathañca nesaṁ viseso udapādi.
anya-e0905n4:193_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante upāliṁ kappakaṁ paṭhamaṁ pabbājesi, pacchā te sakyakumāre,
anya-e0905n4:193_1: atha bhante āyasmā bhaddiyo teneva antaravassena tisso vijjā sacchākāsi, āyasmā anuruddho
anya-e0905n4:193_2: dibbacakkhuṁ uppādesi, āyasmā ānando sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchākāsi, devadatto pothujjanikaṁ
anya-e0905n4:193_3: iddhiṁ abhinipphādesi. Evaṁ kho bhante channaṁ sakyakumārānaṁ upālikappakena saha
anya-e0905n4:193_4: pabbajjā ahosi, evañca pana bhante tesaṁ visesādhigamo ahosi.
anya-e0905n4:195: Pucchā – pakāsanīyakammaṁ āvuso kātuṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:196_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, devadatto bhante “sarājikāya
anya-e0905n4:196_1: maṁ bhagavā parisāya kheḷāsakavādena apasādeti, sāriputtamoggallāneva ukkaṁsatī”ti
anya-e0905n4:196_2: kupito anattamano bhagavati āghātaṁ bandhi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:198: Pucchā – devadattassa āvuso pakāsanīyakammaṁ kārāpetvā kathaṁ bhagavā pakāsetuṁ āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n4:199_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṁ kātuṁ paññapetvā āyasmantaṁ
anya-e0905n4:199_1: sāriputtaṁ āmantesi “tena hi tvaṁ sāriputta devadattaṁ rājagahe pakāsehī”ti, evaṁ
anya-e0905n4:199_2: kho bhante devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṁ katvā devadattaṁ rājagahe pakāsetuṁ bhagavā āṇāpesi.
anya-e0905n4:201: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso devadattena duṭṭhacittena vadhakacittena tathā gatassa ruhiraṁ uppādetvā paṭhamaṁ ānantariyaṁ kammaṁ upacitaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:202_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa chāyāyaṁ caṅkami, atha bhante
anya-e0905n4:202_1: devadatto gijjhakūṭaṁ pabbataṁ āruhitvā mahatiṁ silaṁ pavijjhi “imāya samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ
anya-e0905n4:202_2: jīvitā voropessāmī”ti, atha kho bhante dve pabbatakūṭāni samāgantvā taṁ silaṁ sampaṭicchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:202_3: tato papatikā uppatitvā bhagavato pāde ruhiraṁ uppādesi. Evaṁ kho bhante devadattena
anya-e0905n4:202_4: duṭṭhena vadhakacittena tathāgatassa ruhiraṁ uppādetvā paṭhamaṁ ānantariyakammaṁ upacitaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:203: Pucchā – kulesu āvuso tikabhojanaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:204: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ, devadatto bhante parihīnalābhasakkāro sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñji, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:205: Pucchā – alaṁ devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo, garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedotiādiko āvuso ovādo bhagavatā kattha dinno, kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ dinno.
anya-e0905n4:206: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṁ ārabbha dinno, devadatto bhante saṅghabhedāya parakkami cakkabhedāya, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ dinno.
anya-e0905n4:207: Alaṁ devadatta, mā te rucci saṅghabhedo, garuko kho devadatta saṅghabhedo –
anya-e0905n4:208_0: Pucchā – “sukaraṁ sādhunā sādhuṁ, sādhuṁ pāpena dukkaraṁ. Pāpaṁ pāpena sukaraṁ, pāpamariyehi
anya-e0905n4:208_1: dukkara”nti- āvuso idaṁ udānaṁ bhagavatā kattha udānitaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ udānitaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:209_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṁyeva ārabbha udānitaṁ, āyasmā bhante ānando
anya-e0905n4:209_1: pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi, atha kho bhante
anya-e0905n4:209_2: devadatto yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca
anya-e0905n4:209_3: “ajjatagge dānāhaṁ āvuso ānanda aññatreva bhagavatā aññatreva bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṁ
anya-e0905n4:209_4: karissāmi saṅghakammaṁ karissāmī”ti, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ udānitaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:210: Sukaraṁ sādhunā sādhuṁ, sādhuṁ pāpena dukkaraṁ;
anya-e0905n4:212: Pucchā – bhedānuvattakānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ thullaccayaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:213_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, āyasmā bhante sāriputto
anya-e0905n4:213_1: bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “sādhu bhante bhedānuvattakā bhikkhū puna upasampajjeyyu”nti,
anya-e0905n4:215: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgharāji hoti no ca saṅghabhedo, kittāvatā ca pana saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n4:216_0: Vissajjanā – ekato bhante eko hoti, ekato dve catuttho anussāveti, salākaṁ gāheti
anya-e0905n4:216_1: “ayaṁ dhammo ayaṁ vinayo idaṁ satthusāsanaṁ imaṁ gaṇhatha imaṁ rocethāti”, eteneva
anya-e0905n4:216_2: bhante nayena catunnaṁ vā pañcannaṁ vā channaṁ vā sattannaṁ vā aṭṭhannaṁ vā saṅgharāji
anya-e0905n4:216_3: hoti, no ca saṅghabhedo, ekato bhante cattāro honti, ekato cattāro, navamo anussāveti,
anya-e0905n4:216_4: salākaṁ gāheti “ayaṁ dhammo ayaṁ vinayo idaṁ satthusāsanaṁ imaṁ gaṇhatha imaṁ rocethā”ti,
anya-e0905n4:216_5: evaṁ kho bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca. Evaṁ kho bhante saṅgharāji hoti,
anya-e0905n4:216_6: no ca saṅghabhedo, evañca pana bhante saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
anya-e0905n4:217: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n4:218_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhante bhikkhū adhammādiṁ dhammādīnīti dīpenti, te imehi aṭṭhārasahi
anya-e0905n4:218_1: vatthūhi apakassanti, avapakassanti, āveniṁ uposathaṁ karonti, āveniṁ pavāraṇaṁ karonti,
anya-e0905n4:218_2: āveniṁ saṅghakammaṁ karonti, evaṁ kho bhante saṅgho bhinno hoti.
anya-e0905n4:219: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n4:220_0: Vissajjanā – idha bhante bhikkhū adhammaṁ adhammoti dīpenti, dhammaṁ dhammoti dīpenti,
anya-e0905n4:220_1: avinayaṁ avinayoti dīpenti…pe… duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ duṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti, aduṭṭhullaṁ
anya-e0905n4:220_2: āpattiṁ aduṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti, te imehi aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi na apakassanti,
anya-e0905n4:220_3: na avapakassanti, na āveniṁ uposathaṁ karonti, na āveniṁ pavāraṇaṁ karonti, na āveniṁ
anya-e0905n4:220_4: saṅghakammaṁ karonti, ettāvatā kho bhante saṅgho samaggo hoti.
anya-e0905n4:221: Pucchā – samaggaṁ āvuso saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kiṁ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n4:222: Vissajjanā – samaggaṁ kho bhante saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṭṭhitikaṁ kibbisaṁ pasavati, kappaṁ nirayamhi paccati.
anya-e0905n4:223: Pucchā – bhinnaṁ kho āvuso saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ katvā kiṁ so pasavati.
anya-e0905n4:224: Vissajjanā – bhinnaṁ kho bhante saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ katvā brahmaṁ puññaṁ pasavati, kappaṁ saggamhi modati.
anya-e0905n4:225: Pucchā – saṅghabhedaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:226: Vissajjanā – saṅghabhedaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:228: Pucchā – āgantukānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:229_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, āgantukā
anya-e0905n4:229_1: bhante bhikkhū saupāhanāpi ārāmaṁ pavisiṁsu, chattapaggahitāpi ārāmaṁ pavisiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:229_2: oguṇṭhitāpi ārāmaṁ pavisiṁsu, sīsepi cīvaraṁ karitvā ārāmaṁ pavisiṁsu, pānīyenapi
anya-e0905n4:229_3: pāde doviṁsu, vuḍḍhatarepi āvāsike bhikkhū nābhivādesuṁ, napi senāsanaṁ pucchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:229_4: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “tena hi bhikkhave āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ paññapessāmi,
anya-e0905n4:229_5: yathā āgantukehi bhikkhūhi sammā vattitabbaṁ, āgantukena bhikkhave bhikkhunā idāni
anya-e0905n4:229_6: ārāmaṁ pavisissāmīti upāhanā omuñcitvā nīcaṁ katvā papphoṭetvā gahetvā chattaṁ apanāmetvā
anya-e0905n4:229_7: sīsaṁ vivaritvā sīse cīvaraṁ khandhe katvā sādhukaṁ ataramānena ārāmo pavisitabbo”
anya-e0905n4:229_8: evamādinā bhante āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:230: Pucchā – āvāsikānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ, kathañca pana paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:231_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule āvāsike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n4:231_1: bhante āvāsikā bhikkhū āgantuke bhikkhū disvā neva āsanaṁ paññapesuṁ, na pādodakaṁ
anya-e0905n4:231_2: pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ upanikkhipiṁsu, na paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n4:231_3: na senāsanaṁ paññapesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ –
anya-e0905n4:232_0: “Āvāsikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā āgantukaṁ bhikkhuṁ vuḍḍhataraṁ disvā āsanaṁ paññapetabbaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:232_1: pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ upanikkhipitabbaṁ, paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ
anya-e0905n4:232_2: paṭiggahetabbaṁ pānīyena pucchitabbo” evamādinā bhante āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ
anya-e0905n4:233: Pucchā – gamikānaṁ āvuso bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ, kathañcapana paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:234_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule gamike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, sambahulā
anya-e0905n4:234_1: bhante gamikā bhikkhū dārubhaṇḍaṁ mattikābhaṇḍaṁ appaṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṁ vivaritvā
anya-e0905n4:234_2: senāsanaṁ anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “gamikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā
anya-e0905n4:234_3: dārubhaṇḍaṁ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṁ thaketvā senāsanaṁ āpucchā pakkamitabbaṁ”
anya-e0905n4:234_4: evamādinā bhante ākārena bhagavatā gamikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vattaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:235: Pucchā – bhattagge āvuso anumodituṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:236: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhattagge nānumodiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:237: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṁ āvuso bhattaggavattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:238_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:238_1: bhante bhikkhū dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā bhattaggaṁ gacchiṁsu, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n4:238_2: bhante vatthusmiṁ “sace ārāme kālo ārocito hoti, timaṇḍalaṁ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṁ
anya-e0905n4:238_3: nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṁ bandhitvā saguṇaṁ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā gaṇṭhikaṁ paṭimuñcitvā
anya-e0905n4:238_4: dhovitvā pattaṁ gahetvā sādhukaṁ ataramānena gāmo pavisitabbo”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0905n4:239: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṁ āvuso senāsanavattaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ, kathañca taṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:240_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ, chabbaggiyā
anya-e0905n4:240_1: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūsu ajjhokāse cīvaraṁ karontesu paṭivāte aṅgaṇe senāsanaṁ papphoṭesuṁ,
anya-e0905n4:240_2: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “yasmiṁ vihāre viharati, sace so vihāro uklāpo hoti, sace
anya-e0905n4:240_3: ussahati sodhetabbo”ti evamādinā bhante bhikkhūnaṁ senāsanavattaṁ bhagavatā paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:241: Pucchā – samācāraṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:242: Vissajjanā – samācāraṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:244: Pucchā – sāpattikena āvuso pātimokkhaṁ suṇantassa pātimokkhaṁ ṭhapetuṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:245_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ puggalaṁ dussīlaṁ pāpadhammaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n4:245_1: aññataro bhante puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo tadahuposathe saṅghamajjhe nisinno ahosi,
anya-e0905n4:246: Pucchā – ṭhapanaṁ āvuso pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:247: Vissajjanā – ṭhapanaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante ekā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:249: Pucchā – aṭṭhahi āvuso garudhammehi upasampadā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kassa anuññātā, kismiñca vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:250_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā anuññātā, mahāpajāpati bhante
anya-e0905n4:250_1: gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake
anya-e0905n4:250_2: aṭṭhāsi, atha kho bhante āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ taṁ kāraṇaṁ pucchitvā
anya-e0905n4:250_3: bhagavantaṁ catukkhattuṁ yāci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye āgārasmā
anya-e0905n4:250_4: anāgāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātā.
anya-e0905n4:251: Pucchā – bhikkhūhi āvuso bhikkhuniyo upasampādetuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:252_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ ārabbha anuññātaṁ, mahāpajāpati
anya-e0905n4:252_1: bhante gotamī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “kathāhaṁ bhante imāsu sākiyānīsu paṭipajjāmī”ti,
anya-e0905n4:253: Pucchā – ekato upasampannāya āvuso bhikkhunisaṅghe visuddhāya bhikkhusaṅghe upasampādetuṁ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:254_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaṁ, sambahulā bhante
anya-e0905n4:254_1: bhikkhū bhikkhunīnaṁ antarāyike dhamme pucchiṁsu, upasampadāpekkhāyo vitthāyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n4:254_2: maṅkū ahesuṁ, na sakkhiṁsu vissajjetuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ anuññātaṁ.
anya-e0905n4:255: Pucchā – bhikkhunikkhandhakaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:256: Vissajjanā – bhikkhunikkhandhakaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante dve āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:259: Pucchā – pañcasatikaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:260: Vissajjanā – pañcasatikaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante na katamā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:263: Pucchā – sattasatikaṁ pucchissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
anya-e0905n4:264: Vissajjanā – sattasatikaṁ vissajjissaṁ, sanidānaṁ saniddesaṁ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṁ bhante na katamā āpatti.
anya-e0905n4:266: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n4:268: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
